mapper.insert: INSERT INTO log_service ( userId, username, project, logstore, topic, query, timeFrom, timeTo, totalCount ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{username}, #{project}, #{logstore}, #{topic}, #{query}, #{timeFrom}, #{timeTo}, #{totalCount} );
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) from log_histograms WHERE logServiceId = #{logServiceId}
SELECT userId, username, count(*) AS cnt FROM log_service GROUP BY userId ORDER BY cnt DESC limit 10
SELECT count(*) AS cnt FROM log_service WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{dayCnt} DAY) <= date(gmtCreate) limit 10
SELECT topic AS groupName, count(*) AS cnt FROM log_service GROUP BY topic ORDER BY cnt DESC limit 10
SELECT count(*) AS cnt FROM log_service_servergroup_cfg
SELECT count(*) AS cnt FROM oc_server WHERE (envType >= 3 AND envType != 5) AND serverGroupId IN (SELECT DISTINCT serverGroupId FROM log_service_servergroup_cfg )
